name: The path of solitude demo
description:
very early development stage just want to show a sample so we can grow and learn.

all feedback is good feedback.

The Kapatilian army is advancing, And all the regions have been affected by the growing plague which is the core reason why we go threw our daily struggles, will our heroes be able to bring peace or anguish to our forsaken world. 

the game follows four characters with unique personalities and an unbreakable bond , but will that bond last or will it crumble !
